headline.main: Obesity Can Be a Social and Emotional Issue

docs.abstract: Don-David Lusterman letter disputes Jane Brody's Oct 30 Personal Health column on medication and weight loss (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: As a clinical psychologist who has treated seriously overweight patients for many years, I must raise some issues concerning Jane E. Brody's Oct. 30 Personal Health column on medication and weight loss.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    As a clinical psychologist who has treated seriously overweight patients for many years, I must raise some issues concerning Jane E. Brody's Oct. 30 Personal Health column on medication and weight loss.

headline.main: Fellowships Changing The Face Of Medicine

docs.abstract: National Medical Fellowships, nonprofit group, provides funding to increase number of black, Mexican-American, American Indian and Puerto Rican physicians, many of whom return to under-served communities where they grew up (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Residents of the Coeur D'Alene Indian Reservation in Idaho are often suspicious of Western medicine. So it helps to have Dr. David R. Baines practicing nearby. Dr. Baines is himself an American Indian, raised on a Tsimshian reservation in Alaska. With his cultural background and medical training he can convince his patients that they might need a pill instead of just the healing ritual of a sweat lodge, where boiling water is poured over rocks. And if patients are diabetic, he can better persuade them to take insulin.
docs.snippet: Residents of the Coeur D'Alene Indian Reservation in Idaho are often suspicious of Western medicine. So it helps to have Dr. David R. Baines practicing nearby.    Dr. Baines is himself an American Indian, raised on a Tsimshian reservation in Alaska....
